unnormalised: Hey folks, ever wondered what happens to that leftover chai masala after your morning cuppa? Well, waste management is a hot topic, and not just because of the stench near some dump yards!
normalised: Hey folks, ever wondered what happens to that leftover chai masala after your morning cuppa? Well, waste management is a hot topic, and not just because of the stench near some dump yards!

unnormalised: The IIT-Delhi is making waves with a new composting technique that even handles haldi-stained containers, pretty cool, right? Apparently, it drastically reduces methane emissions.
normalised: The I I T-Delhi is making waves with a new composting technique that even handles haldi-stained containers, pretty cool, right? Apparently, it drastically reduces methane emissions.

unnormalised: Speaking of cool, remember that scene in "Lagaan" where they cleverly reuse everything? We need that level of resourcefulness, guys!
normalised: Speaking of cool, remember that scene in "Lagaan" where they cleverly reuse everything? We need that level of resourcefulness, guys!

unnormalised: Mumbai's BMC is also cracking down on illegal dumping, especially near the Versova beach. They've slapped fines of Rs. 5000 on offenders and are planning to install more CCTV cameras.
normalised: Mumbai's B M C is also cracking down on illegal dumping, especially near the Versova beach. They've slapped fines of rupees five thousand on offenders and are planning to install more C C T V cameras.

unnormalised: The new initiative aims to clean up 100 km of roadside dumping zones by Diwali.
normalised: The new initiative aims to clean up one hundred kilometer of roadside dumping zones by Diwali.

unnormalised: Plus, there’s buzz about a nationwide campaign to segregate waste at source – think dry, wet, and hazardous.
normalised: Plus, there’s buzz about a nationwide campaign to segregate waste at source – think dry, wet, and hazardous.

unnormalised: Hopefully, these efforts will make our cities cleaner and greener, making a 'Swachh Bharat' dream a reality. Let's do our bit, eh?
normalised: Hopefully, these efforts will make our cities cleaner and greener, making a 'Swachh Bharat' dream a reality. Let's do our bit, eh?
